judul: Python Natural Language Processing (NLP): Text Classification with SpaCy
konten: SpaCy is an open-source library for advanced natural language processing in Python, used for text processing...

contoh.isi:
# Example of text classification with SpaCy
import spacy

# Load English tokenizer, tagger, parser, NER, and word vectors
nlp = spacy.load('en_core_web_sm')

text = 'Example text to classify'
doc = nlp(text)

# Analyze syntax
print('Noun phrases:', [chunk.text for chunk in doc.noun_chunks])
print('Verbs:', [token.lemma_ for token in doc if token.pos_ == 'VERB'])

topik.topik: Klasifikasi Teks dengan SpaCy dalam Natural Language Processing (NLP) Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan SpaCy untuk pemrosesan teks dan klasifikasi teks dalam Python.
